page.title: 09PUBLIC HOUSE EPPERSTONE
page.content: The Cross Keys Inn serves drinks and bar snacks,the latter are popular and account for 25% of turnover.It complements the Church as the social centre of the village with 10 or more sports clubs and societies from the local area holding meetings there.Mens and Ladies darts teams operate from there in the winter and Mixed teams in the summer.The landlord and his wife are tenants from the freehold owners Hardy and Hansons Kimberley Brewery. They will not have noisy music machines and the atmosphere is lively, friendly,and well behaved.It is open at lunch time and in the evenings and the busiest times are Sunday midday and Friday evenings.Parents with children are catered for in a separate room with strict age regulations.
